title: "Can you text while your self-driving car is doing the driving? What Florida law says"
excerpt: "You can text away while leaving the driving to your Tesla or other self-driving car. Florida law says that a driver whose car has an “automated driving system engaged” won’t be punished for using the phone behind the wheel ( (in other words, if the car is driving and not you)."
